ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] undead bard question
ygData.msgSnippet: He is something akin to Ragefire, he seems to spawn several times between the real Trakanon.  It seems to be a random amount of time as well, between 12 and
ygData.messageBody:
He is something akin to Ragefire, he seems to spawn several times
between the 'real' Trakanon. It seems to be a random amount of time as
well, between 12 and 36 hours I've been told most often, though some say
as much as 72. Haven't sat and timed him myself so I can't say for
sure.

Azerael Ng'Ataman - Grandmaster of Tarew Marr
Deiele Drindsathis - Wanderer of Tarew Marr
Fflewddur Fflam - Minstrel of Tarew Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Monday, January 21, 2002 4:18 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] undead bard question


OK, Trakanon is down, undead bard spawns around 18 hours later. he is
killed.
Does he spawn again before (the real) Trakanon does or do I need to
wait? Anybody know?
Really frustrating not knowing if the guy is up until you are
practically on top of him. Thanks in advance to anyone who can help.
Tyunes
Bard of 55 songs
Rodcet Nife
